## Istanbul Timeseries Exploration

```{r data}
library(xts)

df <- read.csv("~/Datasets/TS regression - data_akbilgic.csv")
df$date <- as.Date(as.character(df$date), format='%d-%b-%y')

x <- xts(df$ISE, as.Date(df$date), frequency=365)
```
